LanguageData.DMS_Officer01.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a weapons controller at a Command and Control Facility. [PAWN_nameDef] was temporarily laid off due to a lack of maintenance parts for the control system and had to cross-train as a weapons system operator for the task force's autonomous robots at the weapons control station to mitigate friendly fire inicidents.
LanguageData.DMS_Officer01.title: Weapon Systems Officer
LanguageData.DMS_Officer02.description: Due to the immense time required to cross galaxies without FTL technology, by the time the Colonial Forces arrive at their target planet entire generations have passed and rendered their initial data obsolete. [PAWN_nameDef] had to research and catalog the changes in the planet's xenology and climate that occurred while their ship was in transit.
LanguageData.DMS_Officer02.title: Xeno Researcher
LanguageData.DMS_Officer03.description: [PAWN_nameDef] worked for the Medical Department of the Colonial Forces. Due to disputes regarding prisoner's medical rights on-world, [PAWN_nameDef] had to stay planetside until the situation was resolved.
LanguageData.DMS_Officer03.title: Itinerant Doctor
LanguageData.DMS_Officer04.description: [PAWN_nameDef] worked for the Astromechnical Design Department of the Colonial Forces and made adjustments and optimizations to the Automatroid fleet for the local colony.
LanguageData.DMS_Officer04.title: Automatroid Engineer
LanguageData.DMS_Officer05.description: [PAWN_nameDef] worked for the diplomatic department of the Colonial Forces. [PAWN_nameDef] was posted to various faction bases on the planet to provide contacts with friendly local militias and mercenary groups alike.
LanguageData.DMS_Officer05.title: Military Attaché
